task.title: Sharing your Bookmark lists
task.shortdesc: CWRC bookmark lists are by default private. CWRC does, however, provide the option to publicly share these lists. The following steps will demonstrate how you can share a list (which can also be used to make a list private again).

step.cmd: From your dashboard, click on the bookmark list you would like to share.
Select the user you would like to share your bookmark list with.
step.info: You may choose to share your list with everyone or with individual users. If you wish to share with only a few members, you must manually select them.

step.cmd: Click on Share to finalize your decision.
